title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not always work
description: The Close All Saved functionality is not consistently closing all saved files.
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the Close All Saved option does not always close the files that have been saved.
EB: The Close All Saved option should close all the saved files without prompting for unsaved changes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open multiple files in the editor.
2. Make changes to some of the files.
3. Select File menu.
4. Choose Close All Saved option.
